description:
Discord Server / Linktree / Unreal Marketplace Page

What is this?

This is not a full game, this is an art pack made for the Unreal Engine, it contains low-poly gun models and animations in a modern shooter style.

This demo showcases all of the animations and models included in the "Low Poly Animated Modern Guns" art pack asset, which is available to purchase on the Unreal Marketplace.

For those of you interested in this art pack you can check it out HERE.

What's included?

First Person Character Animations

Each gun comes with its own set of unique animations, such as reloading, inspecting, and shooting.

Check out the full Animation List to see all of the included animation files, also check out the Animation Showcase Videos to see them in action!

Animations Included

  • Reloading
  • Reloading Aimed
  • Reloading Empty
  • Reloading Empty Aimed
  • Fire
  • Fire Aimed
  • Inspecting
  • Holstering
  • Holstering Quick
  • Unequip
  • Unequip Quick
  • Grenade Throw
  • Knife Attack
  • Walking Directional
  • Sprinting
  • And More!

Two Customizable Gun Models

Each gun has a unique set of swappable pieces such as barrels, slides, magazines, and more.

Includes

  • SMG (SP60)
  • Pistol (X13)

And much more!

Check it out on the Unreal Marketplace!
